# 使用说明

# persagy-ui：

  • 基于vue的ui库，github地址 ssh://git@101.254.183.198:5522/bi-web/persagy-ui-kit.git

# 一、安装

  • npm install -S persagy-ui

# 二、全局引入

    import Pui from 'persagy-ui';
    Vue.use(Pui);

# 三、推荐-按需引入-方式一

（不用配置主题色）

  • 引入组件 import { Button } from 'persagy-ui''

  • 安装依赖包 npm i -D babel-plugin-component

  • 在 .babelrc中的plugins里添加

    [
      "component",
      {
        "libraryName": "persagy-ui",
        "camel2Dash": false,
        "libDir": "dist",
        "styleLibrary": { "name": "theme", "base": true, "path": "[module]/style.css", "mixin": true }
      }
    ]

# 四、按需引入-方式二

（自定义主题色）

TIP

本项目样式使用stylus开发，需要自定义主题色请按照以下说明配置

1.新建variables.styl文件，放在src目录下

/* base-color -start */
// primary
$blue-900=#004275
$blue-600=#007cdb
$blue-500=#0091ff
$blue-400=#4eb1fd
$blue-300=#82c7fc
$blue-200=#bae0fd
$blue-100=#e1f2ff
$blue-50=#f0f8ff

// success
$success-600=#2ea121
$success-500=#34c724
$success-400=#62d256
$success-300=#8ee085
$success-100=#eef6c6
$success-50=#f0fbef

// success2
$success-600=#04b49c
$success-500=#00d6b9
$success-400=#14e1c6
$success-300=#64e8d6
$success-200=#a9efe6
$success-100=#d5f6f2
$success-50=#eafaf8

// secondary
$cyan-400=#03b5da
//$cyan-cyan
//$cyan-cyan

// warning
$warning-900=#6b3900
$warning-800=#8f4f04
$warning-700=#b26206
$warning-600=#de7802
$warning-500=#f58300
$warning-400=#ffa53d
$warning-300=#ffba6b
$warning-200=#fed4a4
$warning-100=#feead2
$warning-50=#fff5eb

// grey
$grey-900=#1f2429
$grey-800=#333940
$grey-700=#454d54
$grey-600=#646c73
$grey-500=#8d9399
$grey-400=#c3c7cb
$grey-300=#e4e5e7
$grey-200=#eff0f1
$grey-100=#f5f6f7

// error
$error-900=#621c18
$error-800=#812520
$error-700=#ac2f28
$error-600=#d83931
$error-500=#f54e45
$error-400=#f76b64
$error-300=#f9908b
$error-200=#eff0f1
$error-100=#fde3e2
$error-50=#fef2f1

// purple
$error-900=#460b46
$error-800=#681268
$error-700=#8c218c
$error-600=#b320b3
$error-500=#d136d1
$error-400=#db66db
$error-300=#e58fe5
$error-200=#efb9ef
$error-100=#f8def8
$error-50=#fceefc

/* base-color -end */

2.在config里配置引入色值变量，如下

  • 安装style-resources-loader npm i -D style-resources-loader
    {
        test: /\.styl(us)?$/,
        use: [
            {
                loader: 'stylus-loader'
            },{
                loader: 'style-resources-loader',
                options: {
                    injector: 'prepend',
                    patterns: path.resolve(__dirname, 'src/assets/stylus/variables.styl')
                }
            }
        ]
    }

4.配置svg解析

  • 安装svg解析器 npm i -D vue-svg-loader
     {
         test: /\.svg$/,
         loader: ['babel-loader', 'vue-svg-loader']
     }

5.配置.babelrc

    [
      "component",
      {
        "libraryName": "persagy-ui",
        "camel2Dash": false,
        "libDir": "lib",
        "style": false
      }
    ]

Badge →
